process_text: This process tile will allow you to compute the value if the sdg indicator 15.3.1 and its sub-indicators (land cover, soil organic carbon and productivity)
By clicking on the process button, you will:
- start the computation of the layers in GEE and display them on the map
- Download to ypur sepal folder the zonal statistics of the indicators perform on your AOI (you can click on the green btn to download it)
- release the result tile button to download your indicators map locally
result_text: Once the layers are loaded on the map, click on the "download" button to download the indicators .tif in your sepal folder
The green buttons will be released once the files are retrieved from Gdrive and they will allow you to download them on your local computer.

_15_3_1.stats_complete: The statistics are now avaliable in the {} file of your computer or downloadable with the result tile link
